name: multiservers
description: Runs multiple servers on different ports

scripts.old_multi: echo -n > seg_server_list && node codestring_server.js 8500 && node titlepage_url_server.js 8501 & node ../server_new.js /storage/ftempo/data_segments/DataSeg_2.json 8003 & node ../server_new.js /storage/ftempo/data_segments/DataSeg_0.json 8001 & node ../server_new.js /storage/ftempo/data_segments/DataSeg_1.json 8002

author: Tim Crawford
